data.title: Mulligan Stew achievement in Life is Strange: Before The Storm
data.meta_description: How to unlock the Mulligan Stew achievement in Life is Strange: Before The Storm: Complete the optional graffiti #7 in Episode 1: Awake
data.text:
Zasta 360GameTV

31 Aug 2017 31 Aug 2017 31 Aug 2017

23 0 1

Optional graffiti #7 can you find in the train. Move the box on the ground behind you and in the back of the train you will find the location for number 7 (left wall)

Here is my complete video guide for all optional graffiti in Episode 1.

All optional graffiti are immediately saved. You can replay Episodes (Collector mode) to find your missing graffiti. There are always 2 graffiti which you can spray, it doesn't matter which one you spray.

00:08 - Optional Graffiti #1 (Recreational Vandalism)

00:56 - Optional Graffiti #2 (I See U Saw)

01:34 - Optional Graffiti #3 (The Last Unicorn)

02:22 - Optional Graffiti #4 (Home Unimprovement)

03:44 - Optional Graffiti #5 (Rock Idol)

04:36 - Optional Graffiti #6 (Dramatis Personae)

05:23 - Optional Graffiti #7 (Mulligan Stew)

06:36 - Optional Graffiti #8 (Pioneer Spirit)

07:20 - Optional Graffiti #9 (Face Your Anger)

08:10 - Optional Graffiti #10 (Lucid Writing)

Maka91

31 Aug 2017 31 Aug 2017

19 1 0

This achievement is earned for finding optional graffiti #7. If missed on the first run, you can choose the episode from the main menu and select "Collector Mode". Now, you can use a scene select option to browse the locations and choose the area you need.

The following collectible can be found on the train after your friend tells you to sit down. Turn around and move the box. Now, go behind the box and you'll a wall that you can look at. After viewing it, you can add graffiti to it.

[4:06] - Optional Graffiti #7
